channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo

item.title: Israel Carries Out Heavy Strikes on Syria’s Coast, Monitor Says
item.description: Overnight strikes targeted former army positions, according to the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, a war monitor. Israel has said it aims to keep...

item.title: Cruise lines are seeing their biggest passenger surges since the pandemic
item.description: Stock prices for one operator are soaring as well.

item.title: Live Updates: Syria’s New Leaders Receive Diplomats as al-Assad Appears to Defend His Exit
item.description: Bashar al-Assad purportedly issued an account of his flight to Russia in a statement posted to social media. The rebel alliance that drove him from po...

item.title: Canada’s Deputy Prime Minister Resigns, in Blow to Trudeau’s Hold on Power

item.title: Zakir Hussain, Tabla Virtuoso Who Forged Global Fusions, Dies at 73
item.description: His collaborators included John McLaughlin, Béla Fleck, Ravi Shankar, Herbie Hancock, Yo-Yo Ma and members of the Grateful Dead.

item.title: Ripple announces launch of RLUSD stablecoin
item.description: RLUSD will be available on Uphold, Bitso, MoonPay, Archax, and CoinMENA.

item.title: Google DeepMind’s new Veo 2 AI video generator trounces OpenAI’s Sora with 4K resolution
item.description: Google claims Veo 2 has a "better understanding of real-world physics"—an issue that often trips up such tools.

item.title: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz Loses Confidence Vote, Prompting Snap Election
item.description: Chancellor Olaf Scholz lost a confidence vote, deepening the political turbulence in one of the continent’s most powerful economies.

item.title: German Government Collapses as Chancellor Olaf Scholz Loses Confidence Vote
item.description: Chancellor Olaf Scholz lost a confidence vote, deepening the political turbulence in one of the continent’s most powerful economies.

item.title: Biden Prepares to Target Chinese Legacy Chips With Trade Investigation
item.description: The investigation could result in tariffs on older types of chips from China, though the decision would ultimately fall to Trump.

item.title: These are the holiday shipping deadlines you need to know for your presents to arrive on time
item.description: They’re even closer than you feared.

item.title: Elite runner and Peloton instructor Becs Gentry ran 7 marathons in 7 days across 7 continents. How she prepared for the grueling $50,000 challenge
item.description: “In the weirdest way, being the toughest, most stressful thing on my body, it’s brought me such peace and relaxation."
